ABOUT.TITLE: About Me
ABOUT.NAME: Jeremy Heissenberger
ABOUT.SUBTITLE: Software Engineering Student | Java Backend & Angular
ABOUT.BIO: I am a motivated aspiring software developer with a focus on Java backend and modern web technologies. Through intensive university projects at FH Burgenland, I have gained practical experience in developing microservices and reactive frontends. I am currently looking for an internship or junior position to apply my knowledge in professional CI/CD environments and advance real-world projects.

GAMICODE.TITLE: gAmIcode (Ongoing)
GAMICODE.SUBTITLE: Gamified Learning Platform
GAMICODE.DESCRIPTION: Conceptual and technical redesign of a programming task platform towards a modular, extensible architecture. Development of an automated evaluation system for Java (Unit Tests) and SQL, alongside containerization of execution environments.

WEBSHOP.TITLE: Webshop Microservices
WEBSHOP.SUBTITLE: Full-Stack E-Commerce System
WEBSHOP.DESCRIPTION: Development of a modular webshop architecture with separate services for inventory and order management. Focus on quality gates (Checkstyle, PMD) and automated CI/CD pipelines.

SENSOR.TITLE: Distributed Sensor System
SENSOR.SUBTITLE: Cloud & Mobile Integration
SENSOR.DESCRIPTION: End-to-end system for capturing and visualizing sensor data. Secure communication between backend and various clients as well as real-time visualization.

ACTIVE.TITLE: ActiveTogether
ACTIVE.SUBTITLE: Reactive SPA for Course Management
ACTIVE.DESCRIPTION: Single Page Application for efficient management of sports courses. Modern state management with Signals and a responsive UI design for optimal user experience.

IOT.TITLE: IoT Environment Monitor
IOT.SUBTITLE: Python & MQTT
IOT.DESCRIPTION: Networked measurement system based on JoyPi for monitoring environmental data. Stable pub/sub messaging to a central monitoring system.

FOOTER.TITLE: Let's get in touch.
FOOTER.SUBTITLE: I am currently looking for an internship or junior position. My inbox is always open!
